alert.note: Alert for Frazier Mountain Communities; Grapevine; Piute Walker Basin; Tehachapi (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 30 at 1:13PM PST until December 30 at 6:00PM PST by NWS Hanford
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM PST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations of up to one to three inches. Snow level near pass level around 4500 feet. * WHERE...Piute Walker Basin, Frazier Mountain Communities, Tehachapi and Grapevine. * WHEN...Until 6 PM PST this evening. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. The Tejon pass along the I5 Grapevine area has been closed. Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the afternoon commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Frazier Mountain Communities; Grapevine; Piute Walker Basin; Tehachapi
